The Glass Market is one of my favorite food destinations in Copenhagen! Whether you’re looking for fresh ingredients for your next meal or a delicious prepared creation, this is the place to go! Make sure to go to the gelato shop and try the Ferraro Rocher flavor!!🌰🍫 #torvehallerne #glassmarket #gelato #copenhagenEin nydeleg dag i #København #TorvehallerneBlogger onsdag - today in pictures - kære dagbog... Whatever 😅🌿🍾
Ligemeget hvordan det formuleres er det ikke til at komme udenom at Nørrebronx er stedET 😍👌🏼 gammelt møder nyt, grafitti møder klinker som møder solidt træ, som møder enorme hængeplanter, som møder en pæn pige, på hjørnet af Nørrebrogade, siddende på en bænk til den dertil liggende café.. i venstre hånd rummer hun det fyldige espressoshot og i højre leger den rygende cigaret imellem hendes fingre 😍🌿 den røde baret på hendes hoved, symboliserer, sammen med hendes røde læber, at hun er et barn af den fede Nørrebronxkultur 😎✌🏼🤳🏻 flippere, kultursmash samt den rå stil, velkommen til og bli' forevigt 😍🤩😎🍾🍾🌿🌃🏙️

Copenhagen Goat Milk hedder deres projekt hvor de laver oste på mælk fra en næsten uddød gammel dansk landrace geder. Den giver ca 2 liter mælk om dagen og den mælk laver efter vores overbevisning noget af det bedste gedeost vi har smagt. Vi kommer til at have et udvalg på en 6 forskellige slags fra frisk oste til meget lagret. Håber I bliver lige så begejstret for dem og deres oste som vi er blevet. 
#copenhagengoatmilk #ged #ost #cheese #copenhagen #omegnogvenner

#mexican #mexicanfood #tacos #mexicancuisine #foodlove #copenhagen #denmark #citybreak #foodtour #allthefood #flavour #spices #ingredients #chef #youtube #foodblogger #foodstagram #delicious #lunch #foodgloriousfood #instafood #HijadeSanchez #TorvehallerneVinveto i torvehallerne holder champagne smagning.
"Torsdag d. 18/10 kommer mor og datter, fra Champagneproducenten Bergeronneau, til Danmark. 
I den forbindelse vil der blive afholdt en smagning i butikken i Torvehallerne klokken 17.30 - 19.00.

De vil præsenterer 4 forskellige vine fra deres portefølje, og samtidigt forklarer lidt om sig selv og Champagne. 
Tilmelding sker til berner2v@gmail.com og koster 150,- pr person."
#vinbarenvesterbrotorv #vinveto #torvehallerne #champagneVinveto i torvehallerne holder champagne smagning.
"Torsdag d. 18/10 kommer mor og datter, fra Champagneproducenten Bergeronneau, til Danmark. 
I den forbindelse vil der blive afholdt en smagning i butikken i Torvehallerne klokken 17.30 - 19.00.

De vil præsenterer 4 forskellige vine fra deres portefølje, og samtidigt forklarer lidt om sig selv og Champagne. 
Tilmelding sker til berner2v@gmail.com og koster 150,- pr person."

#stalksandroots #autumn #purple #color #flowerstagram #flowers #bouquet #flower #flowerphotography #floweroftheday #copenhagen #flower_daily #flowerpower #torvehallerne #interior #interiordesignideas #interiorstyling#Konfirmation#2019#Torvehallerne#Vejle#ghd#moroccanoil#kms#panayotis#kunst#klipperiet##konfirmations#hår#2019#i#Torvehallerne#snoninger#crep#ghd#dermalogica #panayotis#love#my#job#🍁Super lang efterårsdag rundt i København☀️#Brandmandsmuseet #Assistenskirkegaard #torvehallerne #Nørrebroparken #strøget #shoppingikbh #VictorK #LucasKSi me preguntan dónde estuviste más veces...dudo responder entre el Tiger o este bello mercado llamado #torvehallerne que me vuelve loca!! 😻😻😻.
Esta vez fui con Dani, también es Argentina expatriada y ya nos conociamos! 😄
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Nos tomamos unos ricos cafes con leche en vasos (les encantaaaa servir el cafe con leche en esos vasos 😺) y probé una tortita riquisima!!! 🍰Muy crocante, relleno de frambuesa y un glacé de limón bien ácido ...riquísimo!!!🤤.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Además de las cosas ricas para comer ahi, está el mercado de frutas, verduras y flores 🌷🍎🥑.
Me traje unos lindos papines de colores, y dos remolachas, también de colores raros, que pronto se las muestro en alguna historia!.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Si vienen a Copenhague, no se pierdan este “mercadito” top 😍🎉 .
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Y si, acá venden el super sandwich de cerdo que subí hace poco!! 😉
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
#kovenhavn #copenhagen #torvehallerne #cake #coffee #grannyshouseDeciding what to eat and drink in the Torvehallerne food market Copenhagen is a difficult task ,so many lovely things ..😊
#copenhagen #foodmarket #drinks #wine #deliciousfood #foodenvy #choices #torvehallerne #weekendaway #goodtimesСписок, что сделать в Копе в следующий раз:
🇩🇰 Взять 2 ночи подряд в одном хостеле/отеле. Наши планы менялись на ходу, и пришлось брать дополнительную ночь в соседнем отеле. Из-за разности во времени чек-аут и чек-ин спалили нах несколько обеденных часов 😥
🇩🇰 Купить по паре туфлей Ecco Danish Design. Ecco - датский бренд и приставка Danish Design делает их обувь ещё круче. Нужно будет подготовить дополнительные 500€ 😎
🇩🇰 Уличную еду брать сразу по 2-3 порции - за «опт» у них отличные скидки. Можно получить 3ю единицу условно-бесплатно. Например, 1 хот-дог 🌭 стоит 35 крон (5.5$ если что), а 3 хот-дожика 🌭🌭🌭 будут стоить уже 75 крон. Ах и ох 😬 🇩🇰 Заходить чаще в Irish Pub 🍀 а именно на завтрак, обед и ужин. Разливной #guinness неповторим и великолепен #deliciousdarkness хули 🍺🍺🍺 Но нужно помнить про 70 крон за бокал 🇩🇰 Посетить парк развлечений #tivoli 😍 В первый день мы пришли поздно, во второй день - рано, а в третий - он был закрыт на обслуживание. 240 крон и мы будем там 🎡
🇩🇰 Взять и съесть дюжину устриц на местном рынке еды #torvehallerne 🦅 200 крон и устрицы станут нашими 😜
🇩🇰 Покататься по каналу #nyhavn 🤩 Обеденный приём пивасика, затянувшаяся фотосессия и толпы китайцев мешали нам это сделать на все 100% 💯 Билет в районе 80-100 крон - терпимо 😬
🇩🇰 Взять на прокат по велику 🚲 купить по подставке для стакана на руль и покатать в своё удовольствие по центру 🤩 прокат велика примерно 80-100 крон/день
🇩🇰 Взять и съесть в #seveneleven на центральном жд вокзале ахуительный мегасэндвич с яйцом, салатом и креветками 🦐 Он вкусный и холодный, и горячий 😍
🇩🇰 Прогуляться по улице красных фонарей и конечно же добраться до Христиании 😎 Думаю, каждому нужно пережить что-то подобное и получить бесценный опыт на будущее 💯
🇩🇰 В duty free взять бутылку роскошного Макаллан за 80€ и приговорить ее уже на Крите. Почему на Крите - читайте дальше 😎 #eurocircum✈️Yellow Monday’s 💛 get your flower-fix until 19 @torvehallernekbh
-

#copenhagen #denmark #danish #bakery #food #market #foodie #torvehallerne #vsco #vscocam #travel #travelphotographyFantastisk sushi.... #barsushi #torvehallerne #vejle #2018 #denmark🇩🇰Mmm..hjemmelavet stegt sild i lage. Besøg os i Magasin på Kgs.Nytorv, Lyngby Storcenter, Tivoli Food Hall og i Torvehallerne. Glæder os til at se dig.✨AUTUMN SWEETS✨
I’m not going to beat around the bush. This scent was fully inspired by a SINGLE sweet treat I had while in Copenhagen with my family last summer.🙌🏻🇩🇰🔆
I was daydreaming about said sweet while listening to Neil Young’s “Harvest Moon” {one of my faves} & thinking about how much I miss fall foliage.... not too much of that in Southern California.😜👎🏻
How do I describe this sweet?.... I’ve traveled to a lot of places and this was, hands down, without a doubt THE👏🏻BEST👏🏻 caramel I’ve ever had in my life. It can be found at a shop called @xocolatldenmark within the Torvehallerne Market in Copenhagen. The particular batch we bought looked like little freckled eggs made out of chocolate with a miracle waiting on the inside. Melts in your mouth on contact and isn’t overly sweet. It’s just.... perfection.🤤
So with this mouthwatering memory in mind and my yearning for fall colors {and temperatures}, I created a scent that gives you a rich autumn pastry with cinnamon, clove and vanilla with a loving touch of creamy, dreamy caramel. “HARVEST MOON” is intense without being sickly sweet & that is why I love it.🧡
What’s your favorite fall scent? 🍁🕯🍫⛵️🇩🇰🍂🔥🌙 #luckycat #luckycatcandles #shopluckycat #soycandles #vegan #handpoured #handmade #madeinsocal #travel #memories #candles #copenhagen #denmark #torvehallerne #chocolate #caramel #xocolatl #fall #fallscents #fallcandles #etsy #etsyshop #comingsoon #sneakpeek #harvestmoon #neilyoung 📸:This photo is one I took of the Nyhavn Canal in Copenhagen. Unfortunately I never got a pic of Torvehallerne as we were too busy stuffing our faces with brisket sandwiches & chocolate. {NO REGRETS}Smørrebrød: o prato típico aqui na Dinamarca. Consiste em uma fatia de pão de centeio com diversos recheios em salada, carne, etc. 😊
.
#smorrebrod #smørrebrød #torvehallerne #copenhagen #københavn #denmark #danmark #dinamarca #pratotipicodinamarques #instafood #foodphotography #travelgram
 
Kender du det, når du ser en opskrift strikket op i nye farver og så bare bliver helt nyforelsket? Sådan har jeg det med Gepards Sølvsmeden i denne her lækre grå og koral – find opskriften på webshoppen!

Know the feeling when you see a pattern knitted in new colours and fall in love all over again? That’s the feeling we get from seeing this gorgeous grey and coral version of the Gepard Dragonfly cardigan – find the pattern in our web shop! #gepardgarn #gepardkidseta #gepardmyfinewool #geparddragonflycardigan #dragonflycardigan #gepardsølvsmeden #sølvsmeden #sølvsmedencardigan #uldstedet #vendersgade #torvehallerne #lyngby #lyngbyhovedgade #mohair #mohairsilk #merino #tuesday #thankgoditstuesday #strik #strikstrikstrik #nevernotknitting #knitting #vævestrik #slipstitchknittingВ минулому році ми прочитали #хюгге і вирішили, що булочки - непоганий привід відкрити нову країну. Ще й квитки в #Копенгаген були на знижці - #маломанітревел вирушили в нову пригоду.

Копенгаген - одне з найдорожчих та найщасливіших міст і це відчувається одразу в аеропорту. Скрізь пахне корицею, ваніллю та виглядає дуже затишно. 🏤🏣🏩не шукайте житло через #booking якщо до подорожі мало часу, ціни змушують плакати. Ми зупинилися на #airbnb , бо двоквманті хороми за добу стали в 48€, що дешевше за два ліжка у 10ти(!) місному номері. Господар зустрів нас дуже привітні, дав поради та провів екскурсію по острівцю затишку у місті мрії.
🚌 одразу в аеропорту купили проїзний на добу - 10€ і всі вили транспорту ваші, трансфер з аеропорту включено! Якщо квиток закінчится раніше, ніж треба знову їхати на летовище - памятайте(!): 1.квиток на автобус можна купити у водія. 2.в червоних автоматах "дсб" квитки лише на метро.3.в них можна купити квиток до аеропорту, але лише від конкретної станції. Тобто в автоматі не можна придбати квиток до літачку з пересадками! ⚠аеропорт страшенно великий, потрапивши в нього - розумієш, чому реєстрація починається за 2-3 години. Від входу до гейту ви будете мандрувати хвилин зо 30!⚠
🔷 першочергово ми поїхали на штучний пляж #amagerbro хвилин 15 від аеропорту і ви там. Невеликий, зонований та чистий. Люди займаються спортом, гуляють з собаками і посміхаються тобі просто так. 🔷далі відомий, та по ранковому, Ньюхавн. Раніше там були будинки розпусти для моряків, тепер це туристичний #маствізіт поінт.Та й справді щось в ньому є...такий вільний,колоритний та яскравий.Можливо попоїсти і не вдасться, але побачити листівку наяву - варто.
🔷особисто наш #хомячинасімя #маствізіт - базар #torvehallerne 
Там вам і морепродукти,що готують перед вами і традиційні смореброди від 6€, і спеції, і звичайно ж випічка. Там ми придбали супертрадиційний сувенір - "smoked salt" - 2.5€ за 50 гр і ваші страви стануть трішки щасливішими. 
Про смореброт - ціла культура та свої правила. Менше хліба - більше начиння.Дівчатка можуть наїстись і одним таким красенем.❕На ринку вони найприємніші по ціні.По місту ціна від 10€❕
🔜далі будеBring the season inside! Drop by our store at @torvehallernekbh and get yourself one of these 🧡🌿🌸

Each week some 100,000 people visit Copenhagen's Torvehallerne, a covered market in the city center that opened in September 2011. Noorbo Handelen, is an independent bottler which bottles spirits, oils, and vinegars!

Make sure you are at the table -Hillary Clinton #torvehallerne #copenhagen #denmark🇩🇰GO to Torvehallerne and GET LOST!
_____________________________________________
Torvehallerne is not a supermarket, it is a super market 😉
At Nørreport Copenhagen you can literally get lost among over 60 stands selling everything from fresh fish and meat to gourmet chocolate and exotic spices, as well as many places where you can grab a bite 😋
If you’re planning a trip to Copenhagen you shouldn’t miss this place 🔝
-
Torvehallerne non è un supermercato, è un super mercato!
A Copenhagen potete letteralmente perdervi tra più di 60 banchi che vendono di tutto, dal pesce e carne fresca al cioccolato e spezie esotiche. Inoltre trovate posticini dove poter mangiare qualcosa di pronto 😋
Se pianificate un viaggio a Copenhagen non potete perdervi questo posto 🔝

Torvehallerne IV smørrebrødAyer almorzamos en el mercadito de Torvehallerne! 🍔.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Riquisimo sandwich de cerdo power para mi, de Omegn!! 🙋🏻‍♀️🥪.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Hermoso mercado para conocer... son dos galerias vidriadas con stands de comida, vinos, cosas dulces y un poco más!.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Hay mesitas adentro o al aire libre donde se encuentra la parte de verduras y frutas 🍉🍒🍓🥑🥔.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

#stalksandroots #hortensia #atumn #color #flowerstagram #flowers #bouquet #flower  #flowerphotography #floweroftheday #copenhagen #flower_daily #flowerpower #torvehallerne #interior #interiordesignAdopter os nu bare, Sverige ✌🏻 @mamanascha @jummefromtheblock ❤️#svenska#finefrøkner#snus#epok#vin#torvehallerneAfter 12 years of running UBANG as a fashion kids wear brand it is now time to change direction. The AW18 collection is therefore the last collection from UBANG. 
The decision was hard to take, but nevertheless so right, and I am exited by all the new opportunities ... First step on the new journey was the opening of my UBANG Chp Shop located in Vendersgade 17, 1363 CPH K. (Do follow @ubang_cphshop)
Here I will be having a permanent stock sale of the leftovers from previous collections, and a nice presentation of the AW18 collection...I will be in the shop a new days a week, and working on new projects the rest of  the time.

And when the stock is gone? Well that is what is most exciting as it is still open and unknown. I am brewing on different ideas...
One thing is for sure, my new  life must include ceramics, one way or another ... So I better speed up learning more of this amazing craft...
.
.
.

세상에...이 컬러! 이 디자인!!
덴마크 코펜하겐의 자랑스러운 크래프트 
브루어리 브랜드 “Mikkeller&Friends”

자체 양조시설이 없고 덴마크와 유럽,미국 등의 브루어리에 위탁해 생산하기 때문에 ‘집시브루어리’, ‘팬텀(phantom)브루어리’라고도 불리는 브랜드.
온도에 따라 변하는 일러스트의 라벨 등 디자인까지 사로잡은 1000종이 넘는 맥주를 만들어낸 기상천외하고 공격적인 레시피.
-
#다사고싶어 #한참을보고있었네
#디자인천재들 #맥주캔도감각적
#전세계와콜라보하는미켈러
#덴마크맥주브랜드

#hijadesanchez #copenhagen #copenhagenfood #eater #f52grams #food52 #buzzfeast #feedfeed #tastespotting #tastingtable #forkyeah #travelandlife #travelgram #eattheworld #uglydelicious #torvehallerne #tacos #corntortillas #foodstagram #eatfamous #travelbug #eatcolorfully #huffposttaste #foodblogger #currentcraving #tacothursdayDay 2 in #københavn not so sunny unfortunately. First went to Church of Our Saviour, which was closed for the time being. Ran into a group of Australian friends & family, a guy from Portugal, we started chatting outside the church. Shortly afterwards I went to check out the #amalienborg with the new Portuguese friend, great company along the way, sharing experiences. We separated from the palace as I moved on to #rosenborg castle. Met a girl from #seattle and we kept each other company there. She said my accent is very clear, lol. Lunch was the best part. Went to #torvehallerne a fresh food market. Stopped by for a #dannish style #porridge The place was packed and I asked to share a table with a girl, with whom I had a great conversation with. We’re very like-minded & #unconventional It was simply the best meal in #denmark Did a bit #shopping at #strøget The girl at #decadentcopenhagen actually did an exchange in #hangzhou so we started sharing stories about #china and #india So this is how I spent the second day in #copenhagen It’s not my favorite city along this #scandinavia trip but the people I met here are the gem without doubt. Are #scandinavian people cold? Locals asked me this question a couple of times. I say, as long as you say hi or smile at them, they will always say hi back and smile back:) I absolutely fell in love with #scandinavia and this is so far the most enlightening & rewarding trip I’ve ever had.Torvehallerne IAmazing fresh food market in Copenhagen #torvehallerne #creamsnegl #rhubarbtea #tbar #teashop #vinegar #oilVerdens bedste hjemmesko, dem fra danske Glerups, kommer nu også i en rå armygrøn – og det gælder alle størrelser og alle modeller! “The Art of Hygge” ❤️🇩🇰 Hygge can be to go out, buy good quality groceries and take time while cooking and eating☺️ “At hygge om noget”, means to take good time when doing something, while trying to do it well with out any pressure. Like cooking a nice dinner, still being relaxed and having fun at the same time, taking your time to enjoy it💁‍♀️ This is something one can do by oneself, or together with others and still be “hygge”🥂🍷👌 Photos by: Nick Karvounis, Francois Botha and Dave Latovsky

#デンマーク大使館 #デンマーク料理 #instafood #danishhygge #hygge #ヒュッゲ #theartofhygge #danskmad #danishhygge  #hyggetogether #denmarkinjapan #whatishygge #デンマーク生活 #デンマーク #美味しい食べ物 #料理好き #デンマークらしい #torvehallerne #danishdesign #デンマークデザインTorvehallerne is a buzzing food hall smack-bang in the city centre. Here you can find some of the freshest produce that Copenhagen has to offer! If you’re from London, consider it like a very upscale Borough Market type. We loved strolling around but the best part was the fruit/vegetable stall and fresh flowers in the middle of the two main buildings 💐
•
But as with any great place like this, it will drill a hole in your budget 💸 We like to keep it as transparent as possible and although we found a couple places with clear vegan options they were quite expensive for our budget. This salad bowl packed with great things came in at about £12 🥗😱 So go, stroll, get hungry and spend your money somewhere else 😂
•

We went to Torvehallerne no fewer than 3 times on our five day trip 😅:
🧀
the first time to sample cheese on our tour with @foods_of_copenhagen,
🌸

#stalksandroots #hibisco #hibiscusflower #atumn #color #flowerstagram #flowers #flower  #flowerphotography #floweroftheday #copenhagen #flower_daily #flowerpower #torvehallerne #interior #interiordesignFlirting with autumn#copenhagen#torvehallerne#foodies#时差请放过我You will find many mouth watering eats in Copenhagen’s Torvehallerne market, including this little gem, @sushiloversdk . The small sushi bar serves some really impressive tasting (and looking!) sushi rolls, including this Spicy Salmon Katsu Maki. We first discovered this spot in 2014, and 4 years on, it’s still one of our favourites. This leaves us wondering why it hasn’t found its way out of Denmark like Sticks n Sushi, which in our opinion is only half as good and far more expensive.

Rows of smorrebrod line the shelves at Copenhagen's Torvehallerne Market. A Danish favourite, there is no limit to the variety and combination of toppings to create a tasty and visually appealing food item.

Hj syltede asier, tyttebær og krus persille. #efterår #jæger #laks #asier #tyttebær #kruspersille #hav.dk#torvehallerne #hav2go #fredag #fisk2gangeomugen #sisse&co 🐟🐟🐟blue skies and a snackMercado de Torvehallerne | Descubre COPENHAGUE con nuestra colección #AlhenaResponsable http://ow.ly/uz4U30lY6k4 
La inauguración de este mercado en septiembre de 2011 es una muestra del creciente interés en adquirir alimentos orgánicos y productos frescos y de granja, entre otros. Fue diseñado por el arquitecto Hans Hagens, dotándolo de un carácter urbano verde con la plantación de árboles en consonancia con las instalaciones, además de reutilizar los adoquines de granito originales de la plaza en que se sitúa.
📸 Sofie Amalie Klougart

Go’ fredag 🤗 snup en hoddoek med sweet seeds til at sparke weekenden i gang 👍🏼 Så god at camera eats secondly 😀#torvehallerne #koreanskstreetfood #glasurpåtur #snackingHappy birthday to our baby Dottie! We took her to #torvehallerne and let her pick a cake out of the cabinet to be her birthday cake in Denmark. A local man was looking at the cake too and told us it’s a traditional danish cake made of cake trimmings and crumbs that they roll in marzipan. #Traestoller Dottie was a fan! In Danish birthday fashion, we added some flags for flair 🇩🇰 🍰 🎁It was a wonderful day with Dottie that we won’t soon forget ❤️Taste the world ❤️ #taste #torvehallerne #streetkitchen #streetfood #foodaddict #yummy #travelgram #foodporn #copenhagen #denmark🇩🇰 #eating #foodporn #smakowaćżycie #jedzonko #szama #najpierwmasa #tasty #omnomnom #najlepiej #onlygoodvibes #pićjeśćspaćjaktamagotchi #bedziesztojadlAmazed by these flowers 💐 😍

Tak for det fine billede @anja_cph 📸Throwback to these delicious smørrebrød from @hallernes at @torvehallernekbh when I visited Copenhagen two months ago.

Ingredients are always fresh and I love all their smørrebrød , especially SALMON and SHRIMP. Expensive but delicious. My must-go whenever I am in Copenhagen.

Any smørrebrød fans here? Where do you go for smørrebrød in London?

#rusticinspiredkichen #onthehousebistro #gourmetgetaway ,#allspicecateringco #copenhagen #farmersmarket #berries #torvehallerne #loveforfood #wonderlust #scandinavia #foodceleb #foodporn #foodgasm #copenhagenfoodAdventures in Copenhagen Day 1. #Nyhavn #OurSavioursChurch #Freetown #MuslingBistro #TorvehallerneDe dejligste efterårsblomster står og lyser på mit bord - der er ikke noget bedre end at forkæle sig selv 🌿🌼 selvom de ikke holder evigt, elsker jeg bare friske afskårne blomster som man selv kan vælge og sammensætte - gule trommestikkere, lilla hortensia og tidsler blandet med olivengrene #torvehallerne #blomster #efterår #hygge #forkælelse
 
En af de butikker, som jeg holder allermest af i Torvehallerne er helt klart Exotic Mix 👌🏻 Jeg kan anbefale deres tørrede frugter 🍍🍓 uden tilsat sukker og deres super gode nødder 🌰🥜, som er overtrukket med chokolade 🍫 #exoticmix #exoticmixkbh  #nuts #driedfruit #nice #torvehallerne#LittleMermaid #Langelinie #pheonixcopenhagen #Kastellet #TorvehallerneKEY NOTE: Smørrebrød is a huge deal and artistic delicatessen in Denmark!!
.
‘Smør og brød’ meaning ‘butter and bread’ is taken to a whole new level. It is basically an open sandwich of dark brown bread topped with meat or fish and veggies in a way that is both tasty and beautiful.
.
You can try it at the restaurants in Torvehallerne along with Greek food, Sushi and fresh dishes from the sea (“ceviche” like).
.
.
.
.
#smørrebrød #dansk #foodporn #freshfish #coldcuts #beautifulfood #foodie #torvehallerne #denmark #hungryformore #fatty #chefs #delicatessen #ceviche #bacon #schrimps 👩‍🍳🍽🥓🇩🇰🌿🥑🍞 #visitcopenhagenMy first thought was “a farmers market is always cheaper”, but that may not be true for all products.
.
You can see the difference in price between a local supermarket and the ones at Toverhallerne (don’t forget that this is a touristic spot).
.
Of course you can’t compare a huge company production and a local farmer’s harvest. And besides, just look at those lovely baby carrots! Or the dusty potatoes!
.
Maybe is my inner hipster talking here, but  just with that look I want to eat them all!
.
.

#DestinationCopenhagenWhat can you get for $20... My favorite day of the week is Monday, when I have finished planning out what meals I’m making for the week. I find that I save both money and time by getting everything done at the beginning of each week. It also means that at the farmers market, I can fill my basket all the way up with fresh produce. 
Just look at all those colors 🥒🥕🍋🍆 🍅

#feefest 🇩🇰🇩🇰🇩🇰Lørdag eftermiddag tilbragt i Torvehallerne med frokost på @lelestreetkitchen og indkøb af sæsonens grøntsager og fine blomster 💐Nansensgade flow • Ibsens Hotel by @arthurhotels from @eringraetz... is our favourite place to stay in A/W Copenhagen. It's not just the welcoming HAY furnishings or resident 'cozy hour' with added mulled wine with flaked almonds (#glögg) but around the corner you'll find a pretty sweet @sticksnsushi and a perennial Danish must-visit: Høst Restaurant by @cofocodk - tasting menus at their finest. Take breakfast at @torvehallernekbh down the road and head back to the cosy Ibsen's for a day spent in the library lounge listening to records by the fire...

#stalksandroots #atumn #color #rum #branches #berries #flowerstagram #flowers #flowerphotography #floweroftheday #copenhagen #flower_daily #flowerpower #torvehallerne #interior #interiordesign這個市場實在太棒了👏 Lovely market! #Torvehallerne #CopenhagenÚltimas dicas de Copenhagen. Em primeira mão. Rs.
Imperdivel o Food Market Torvehallerne (1) para comer , beber ou levar pra casa. Também tem uma lojinha de produtos para cozinha e exóticas flores.
Vale o passeio num dos parques de diversão mais antigos da Europa  em funcionamento, o  Tivoli, de 1843 (2), Uma viagem no tempo, mas crianças aproveitam melhor a partir de 01 mt de altura.!
Para compras, a Stroget (3). Diz-se que é o complexo pedonal mais longo do mundo! Lojas de destaque Lego, Illums  Bolighus com coisas maravilhosas para casa e Illum magazine de moda. Vale também  os restaurantes do Rooftop! Por fim, siga pela Escadinávia de trem , partindo da maravilhosa estação  Dinamarquesa, inaugurada em 1911 (4).

#shopping #stocksaleFantastisk fredag 🦐🍷
#fantastiskselskab #besøgfrajylland #familie #familyweekend #weekend #hav2go #takeaway #torvehallerne #torvehallernekbh #sogood #salmon #tuna #seafood #prawns #shrimp #freshfood #redwine #wine #nørrebro #københavn #copenhagen #madaboutcopenhagen #cphfood #copenhagenfoodOne of my favourite food spot in Copenhagen - Torvehallerne food market. A place where you can get everything from fresh fruits to fresh seafood and even pastries and coffee. Yeap you heard me right, fresh seafood. Oysters!!! They are amazing and the sellers know their stuff well. I also got a chance to try their seafood salad. Not a big fan of it but it was a great experience.

I 1200-tallet var et stigende antal togter på store gårde så stort et problem, at æblerov blev skrevet ind i Jyske Lov fra 1241. Her blev handlingerne sidestillet med indbrud og straffet hårdt. #stalksandroots #atumn #color #yellow #sunflower #flowerstagram #flowers #bouquet #flower  #flowerphotography #floweroftheday #copenhagen #flower_daily #flowerpower #torvehallerne #interior #interiordesignВсем привет и доброго утра 😎 Местный рынок еды #torvehallerne очень и очень привлекательное место со всеми его вкусностями и лакомствами. Обилие блюд из рыбы и вообще морских блюд аж зашкаливает.  Думаю каждый тут сможет найти что-то себе по вкусу. Конечно, придётся закинуть нормально так деньжат, но это место не исключение на карте города, поэтому ничего не бойтесь и смело заскочите сюда на пару рыбных палочек 🤩 #копенгаген #eurocircum✈️ 🇩🇰

#illustration #drawingmaps #map #editorialillustration #Ling #magazine
#travelmagazine #travel #Denmark #kopenhague #denlillehavfrue #nationalmuseet  #nyhavn #kongenshave #torvehallerne #christiania #christianshavn #danskdesigncenter #papermagazine #printmagazine #illustrator #mapillustration  #illustratorsoninstagram #illustrationartistsThe Torvehallerne food market in Copenhagen
Go there just to feast your eyes, maybe get a cheese you can enjoy with wine at home. Kids loved the ice cream, their shop is on the outside of the “main market” but you will see the sign if you walk along the perimeter. Most of the folks at the shops were friendly, but our kids weren’t really in the mood for a sit down meal. You will have to take the S-train from Copenhagen central station to get there.
Have you been here? What was your favorite food?

Wir freuen uns auf den nächsten Besuch... #frühstück #kaffee #coffee #kopenhagen #coffeecollective #coffeelover #morningcoffee #torvehallerneSmorrebrod is the quintessential Danish food, best described as an open sandwich with elaborate toppings 🥙

One of the best places for smorrebrod is @hallernes , also located in @torvehallernekbh food markets. Everything was delicious. 
We tried:
🔸 Today's Herring - pickled herring, quarter of a boiled egg, dill, capers and...whipped cream (?) on dark rye. 🔸Roast pork - thick slice of meat and crackling topped with braised cabbage and pickled cucumber 🔸Danish meatball - a hefty construction of meatballs, potato salad, chives and watercress
.
.
.

#torvehallerne #myfavouriteplace #cphCopenhagen is well-known as an affluent city and this is reflected in the high cost of living. 
Even so, I cringed a little at forking out ~AUD 7 (DKK35) for a small 6 oz coffee which seems to be the average here ☕

Luckily the coffee from @coffeecollectif was excellent, on par with Sydney & Melbourne (showing my bias, sorry 😅) #silverlining

Find them in the @torvehallernekbh food markets and around the city
.
.
.

Ordinary beauty. 
Recognition of it is an ability to appreciate.
Subtle. So beautifully subtle. 
So perfectly ordinary.2018.8.1-8.11 북유럽 여행에서 #torvehallerne KBH 시장#코펜하겐은 생각보다 무척 작은 도시였다. 작지만 너무나 정비가 잘 되어있고, 군더더기 없이 깔끔한 도시. 이 곳의 시장 또한 디자인과 디스플레이가 럭셔리하다. 디자인에 검정색을 잘 쓰는 곳 #copenhagen#denmarkDo you like food markets or searching for hidden treasures and making bargains at flea markets? Then we definitely recommend you to visit some of Copenhagen’s many charming markets. Most are open on Sunday and Saturdays but some are also open in the weekdays. Below you can see some of the most populær markets in the city. #torvehallerne (food/drinks), #kødbyensmadogmarked (food/drinks), #thorvaldsenspladsantiquemarket (antiques), #verasloppemarked (clothes/antiques), #remisenloppemarked (clothes/antiques), #ravnsborggadeloppemarked (clothes/antiques), #frederiksbergloppemarked (clothes/antiques), #denblåhal (antiques), #stefansgadeloppemarked (clothes). You are always welcome to ask the service staff in the reception. See you at #hotelnoracopenhagen. #hotelnørrebro, #cheephotelcopenhagen, #breakfastincluded, #visitcopenhagen.BREWERY OF THE MONTH:

BELHAVEN BREWERY - Belhaven means ‘beautiful harbour’ - Operating for nearly 300 years, it has earned itself the name of the oldest working Scottish brewery - The Emperor of Austria declared it to be “the Burgundy of Scotland”! OUR SELECTION: 🍺 CRAFT PILSNER 4,8%
🍺 SPEYSIDE OAK AGED BLOND ALE 6,5%

Hodnocení: ⭐️⭐️⭐️#TorvehallerneSmørrebrød | hned první den jsme je museli ochutnat - typické tmavé chleby na nekonečno způsobů 🥪🥪 #smørrebrød #copenhagen #torvehallerne #kodan #citylife #foodporn #dnescestujem #brunch@groedcph has built a business selling porridge in all its forms - oatmeal, risotto, daal, congee... you get the idea.

This morning, I had the 5 grain bowl with gluten-free oats, quinoa and chia seeds cooked in almond milk 🍚🌾 Skyr yogurt, hazelnuts and berry compote topped it off.

Absolutely delicious, hygge in a bowl 💕😊 .
.
.

Signore, fai che la prossima fermata sia #copenaghen !😕 #torvehallerne #smorrebrod #smørrebrød #torvehallernekbh #foodporn #pornofood #mercato #food #fame #fameneabbiamo #nordicfood #eatlocal #stopersvenire #localfood #instafood #opensandwich #cphL a  B o c a  I n  T h e  S u n #laboca #israelsplads #dinner #copenhagen #delditkbh #deldinby #ibyen #sharingcph #sunnyside #torvehallerne #argentinianfood #malbec@groedcph is the place to if you’re in Copenhagen and need a nourishing breakfast to set you up for the day 🥄 This really was some of the most beautiful porridge I’ve ever eaten...of course, I couldn’t resist ordering Grød’s ‘all-in’ porridge bowl - topped with EVERY topping 👌 A blissful combination of caramel sauce, peanut butter, fruit compote, strawberries, banana, cacao nibs, chocolate chips, skyr, dried raspberries, hazelnuts, granola, chia seeds and apple! Heaven in a bowl - I’m definitely going to try and recreate something like this at home. Denmark has such a wonderful aesthetic and approach to life - the concept of Hygge is certainly something I’d like to learn more about, and if that involves comforting breakfasts like this, I’m all up for it!

Lo q le gustán los helados a @kittysweety_yt ! A vosotros? #copenhague #torvehallerneThese photos were taken a couple of weeks ago on a trip to @torvehallernekbh on my way home from work. Looking for something delicious (and beautiful) to take home, I wandered over to the almost overflowing fruit and veg stalls and, much to my delight, was greeted by the first early signs of autumn. Artichokes, plums, carrots, mushrooms, hazelnuts, figs and the last of summer’s rhubarb all nestled closely in their crates, creating the most beautiful display of colours and textures. The weather and golden evenings aren’t the only reason this is my favourite time of year.Dejlig dag hos min datter @sif.r.v Jeg købte lidt ind i Torvehallerne ved Nørreport  station på vej derind. Bla spicy fiskefrikadeller og Go Green smothie med bla æble, spinat og citron. Og havde bla vindruer og tomater med fra genboens have. Min datter havde lavet en dejlig blå drik, som hun hellere selv må skrive hvad var, det har jeg glemt. #torvehallerne #smoothie #smoothiegogreen #avokado #figner #tomater #blådruer #fiskefrikadeller #spinat #brød #brødmedhavsalt #kanelsnurrer #hyggeA flower-field ready for a quick to go, rapped up for 168,- 🌿🌸 Visit us from 10-19 in @torvehallernekbh

Nederdelen er fra #lovechild1979 gammel cowboyjakke fra #frenchconnection blomster fra #torvehallerne #fashion #bloggersbyheart #vejentilbirkin #ootd #dagensoutfit #skirtWhen your soul needs a hug, go find some hygge 🇩🇰
.
This summer has been a difficult one for me and this somewhat spontaneous mini break was just what I needed. 
I know I've already vacay-spammed the hell out of my instastories, but it was sort of like my one big reply to all the lovely messages I received whilst away asking how I was, where I was, and if I was still alive!
.
Copenhagen popped my solo trip cherry and I fell hard and fast for this beautiful city. I know I'm a wordy person, but all the words in the world couldn't do it justice! There's just a je ne sais quoi, a vibe, a warmth in the atmosphere that you just need to experience...I guess that's hygge. And I loved it 💫
.
Man did I need this trip. I just didn't know how much I needed all the ways it would change me 💕
.
.
.

#feelfree w/ #GTorvehallerne in Copenhagen can provide you with fresh fruits and berries, organic and special food, delicious meals and snacks, drinks and more. The market is located close to Nørreport, which means that it’s very easy and convenient to get to. If you’re looking for something special, fresh, or innovative in Copenhagen, this market should be your destination!

#여행스타그램 #북유럽 #덴마크 #코펜하겐 #골목골목알록달록진짜이쁨 #덴마크왕립도서관 #만화방 #룬데토른 #torvehallerne
 
코펜하겐에서 커피를 단 한 잔만 마실 수 있다면, 당연히 The Coffee Collective. ☕️ 런던의 탭커피처럼 코펜하겐의 커피콜렉티브도 단 세 개의 매장을 운영 중이다. Torvehallerne 지점은 그 중 가장 번화가에 있는 곳. 근처에서 점심을 먹은 김에 커피를 마시러 들렀다. 테라스에 앉아 커피를 마시며, 옆에 앉은 캐스퍼의 어머니와 대화를 한참 나누었다. 누워있던 캐스퍼가 맞은 편에 앉은 나를 보며 방긋방긋 웃어준 덕에.
3년 전, 반지하에 있던 Jægersborggade 지점은 그 길 초입에 큰 건물로 이사를 갔더라. 그때 여기 커피를 마시고 반했었는데- 이번에도 이 도시에 도착하자마자 그 길로 향했고, 아마 매일 그 길에 들르겠지. 
그때나 지금이나 아무 계획없이 오는 코펜하겐이구나. 코펜하겐 카드도 없이 돌아다니다니, 조금 용감했나, 무모했나. 내 친구라면 모두 알고 있을 코펜하겐 전생 고향설(그리고 팬더가 될 다음 생). 이 도시가 다 기억난다고 헛소리를 하며 지도도 없이 한참 걸었다. 그래놓고 코펜하겐 시내 한복판에서 친구에게 나 찾으러 오라고 현재 위치를 찍어주었지만..
이번 여행에선 내가 예전에 자주 가던 카페들을 하나씩 가보고 있는데, 다들 그대로 있거나 잘 되어서 분점을 내거나, 카페를 확장하거나. 기본에 충실한 카페들이어서일까. 하지만 커피맛은 그대로인 것 같아 기뻤다. 
나의 코르타도를 만들고 있는 바리스타를 초상권을 지키는 선에서 찍어 보았다. 테이블로 커피를 가져다주는 그는 커피만큼 친절했다. 그는 나의 반응에 만족한 듯 돌아갔다. 역시 우유가 맛있는 곳에서는 우유가 들어가는 커피를.Feels like home with this one.... only at @restaurant_kiinkiin ⭐️ #coconut #pandan #michelinstarHeaven! #seafood #denmark #copenhagen #food #foodgasm #torvehallerne #cph #oyster #fishnchips #friedfood #moulesfrites #dinnerFeels a bit like holidays. #2weekstogo #torvehallerne #copenhagen #workandttavelnorreport 駅近くの市場へ
新鮮なオーガニックな食材ばかり。
.

#torvehallerne
#copenhagenYes, another #kombucha post !
I found this amazing drink, made by @nordicfermentation at #torvehallerne . It is made with just #raw products - their own produced raw honey and local #berries . The thing I like about it - it is not super sweet as the ones made with sugar and you can feel better the nice berries’ aroma and the real kombucha taste. It’s completely #organic and no CO2 is added. I have tried many and this one is on my top list now <3

You'll find them dotted around the city but this one on #Frederiksborggade is a favourite of ours. Close enough to browse the wonderful food stalls at #Torvehallerne and the palm houses at the #BotanicalGardens, it's the perfect cosy pitstop on a rainy morning. #cph #copenhagen #købnhavn #summervibes #citytrip #traveleurope #exploringeurope #farmersmarket #eatwhatmakesyouhappy #torvehallerne #copenhagenfood #copenhagenlife #summerinthecity #nikonphotography #travelsummer #girlswhotravel #travelcopenhagen #traveldenmark #exploringcopenhagen #smørrebrød #torvehallernekbh #freshfood #igers_berlin🌻🌼🌷🌳🌾 #copenhagen #torvehallerne #foodmarket #denmark #flowers #scandic #europe #boat #yacht #nordics #nordicstyleCopenhagen, Denmark. .
.
.
'Copenhagen, Denmark’s capital, sits on the coastal islands of Zealand and Amager. It’s linked to Malmo in southern Sweden by the Öresund Bridge. Indre By, the city's historic center, contains Frederiksstaden, an 18th-century rococo district, home to the royal family’s Amalienborg Palace.Nearby is Christiansborg Palace and the Renaissance-era Rosenborg Castle, surrounded by gardens and home to the crown jewels.' Google says 😝 I came to know Copenhagen as a food lovers heaven with idyllic snow covered streets that remind me of Jason Bourne and the best lattes I've ever had from the coffee collective in Torvehallerne. The city was so well laid out with worldly shops, open people who loved talking about their travels, what parts of the city I should visit next and of course.. Bikes! I also remember the warm respite of the botanical gardens as we walked the streets during a cold snap in March and couldn't believe my eyes or ears when we heard the European police sirens, something I know means it should be bad, but always makes me smile because it reminds me of all the foreign movies I love. I miss you, Copenhagen! .
.
.
#Copenhagen #køpenhavn #denmark #landscape #panorama #photography #travel #travelphotos #travelblog #Europe #Scandinavia #world #snow #nature #outdoors #botanical #gardens #tourist #torvehallerne #foodie #latte #instatravel #coffee #thecoffeecollectiveTorvehallerne | Copenhagen

A "Smørrebrød" is a Danish open sandwich which usually consists of a base of buttered rye bread, decorated with an assortment of cold cuts, meat, fish, cheese or spreads. 
These beautifully presented incredible edibles caught my eye whilst schmoozing through Torvehallerne, Copenhagen's fresh food market.

If you haven't been, go! A treat for the eye and the stomach.
.
.
.

#ice #icecream #is #isabel #isabella #obviously #kbh #københavn #torvehallerne #tasty #frozen #treats  #holdontosummerОбожаю рынки! Нет, не наши, а зарубежные. Те, которые с вкусной едой, без бабулек с овощами и полудохлой курицей на пакетах. Те, которые уютные. .
В Копенгагене - это Torvehallerne. Маркет с большим количеством точек уличной еды. Вкуснейшие, свежайшие, огромные и супер сытные смореброды мы ели здесь
. 
В Лондоне - это Borough Market. Дегустации и атмосфера - про него. Здесь мы купили офигенный английский сыр, насыщенный классический breakfast tea и необычный чай, листья которого вымоченны в виски 😈 Здесь мы попробовали морского ежа буээ🤢 Не советую. Если случайно тыкнуть в него вилкой не туда куда надо, он может сжаться то ли от страха, то от удовольствия, как знать 😀 А ещё здесь я летала на 7 небе от съеденного лаваша с жаренными креветками размером с пол кулака. .
Наши тоже начинают стремиться к такому формату. Тому подтверждение - рынок на Лесной в Киеве и Сумской рынок в Харькове. Сумской рынок для меня вообще стал открытием.
. 
Короче, рынки - это сила. Теперь в каждом городе буду искать по местному рынку )) Может кто ещё знает классные рынки в городах? Делитесь! .

#copenhagen #denmark #cinnamonrolls #kanelsnegl #breakfast #coffee #cappuccino #torvehallerne #food #inspiration #goodmorningGrym frukost för 2 Earlybird shoppers.  #dronningensby #homesweethome #torvehallerneДля тех кто собирается в Копенгаген поделюсь ценами немножко. 
Чтобы перевести в гривны нужно умножить на 4,4 * Знаменитое датское Крафтовое пиво Mikkeller - 65 крон за 0,4 * Салат с лососем из супермаркета 7 eleven - 45 крон
* Вода без газа в супермаркете - 17 крон за 0,5
* Смореброд - от 55 до 125 крон, мы брали с селёдкой и митболами по 58, с куриным салатом за 62 и салатом с лососем за 99
* Вход в парк Тиволи 120 крон, а если с безлимитным проездом - 350
* Citypass карта с безлимитным проездом на 3 дня - 200 крон
* Подъем на круглую башню 25 крон
* Подъем на Церковь Спасителя - 50 крон * Пиво в парке Tivoli - 47 крон
* Митболы с картофельным салатом 65 крон
В принципе в парке на фуд-корте практически все по 65, в рестиках основное блюдо около 200 крон
* Сладкая вата 35 крон
* Завтрак (две яичницы, авокадо и наггетсы, два лимонада) - 260 крон на двоих
* Часовая экскурсия на лодке - 50 крон
* Музеи - в среднем около 80 крон. Но если цель - именно ходить по музеям и замкам, лучше купить Copenhagen Card, она даёт бесплатный вход в большинство. Стоит около 650 крон на три дня вместе с безлимитным проездом. Дорого, но экономия существенная. ***
#copenhagen #denmark #smorrebrod #copenhagenprices #travel #foodporn #trip #vsco #bestofvsco #torvehallerne #ukrainianblog

.
Mikkellerでクラフトビール。
(ビール飲めないけどせっかくだから飲む。笑)
内装やグラス、コースターまでおしゃれで、
お姉さんもたくさん話しかけてくれて癒された☺︎
売り物の缶ビールもたくさんのデザインがあって、
どれもかわいいのでお土産におすすめ。
.
Mikkellerのあとはフードマーケットの
Torvehallerne KHBへ。
いろんなお店で食べたいものを買って外でごはん。
美味しくて幸せ〜！
・・・だったのに、
このあとミツバチに刺されて意気消沈。笑
.
.

Torvehallerne. Everything is challenging - pronunciation and remembering street names but that's what makes exploring a new city fun. This is a known food hall and since it has been raining all day today, we decided to come here and hang out and have some snacks. Seafood, bakeries, beers (!), flowers, fruit and vegetables, great tasting coffee, you name it it's here!

#stalksandroots #arnejacobsen #hotel #artichoke #autumn #latesummer #flowersofinstagram #flowers #flower #interior #interiordesign #copenhagen #flower_daily #flowerpower #torvehallerneIt is not a supermarket – it is a super market. At Torvehallerne in Copenhagen, you will find over 60 stands selling everything from fresh fish and meat to gourmet chocolate and exotic spices, as well as small places where you can have a quick bite to eat. Here, you can eat breakfast at Grød, drink a nice cup of coffee at Coffee Collective, eat tacos at Hija de Sanches and so much more. “Torvehallerne” also have a broad range of flowers 💐 #torvehallernekøbenhavn #torvehallerne #copenhagen #københavn #followmytravel #exploretheworld #yahootravelexplorers #travelgirl #travelholic #travel #travelersnotebook #traveladdict #travelaroundtheworld #jordenrunt #moments #mytinyatlas #explore #instagood #instagrammers #instapic ##flowertattoo #flowerstagram #flowers #tulips #denmarkHey, madøre! Kom forbi i morgen, når vi afholder “Fra madspild til måltid” sammen med @foedevarebanken, @torvehallernekbh og @copenhagencooking på Torvet foran Torvehallerne. 6 dygtige kogebogsforfattere skal trylle overskudsmad fra Torvehallerne om til lækre måltider, som du selvfølgelig skal smage. 🍽🥘♻️ Ud over @annemad og @ditsen, der er kvinderne bag den nye, smukke kogebog du ser her, kommer også @mickicheng, @louisalorang og akvavit-drengene @suneurth og Rasmus Poulsgaard. #copenhagen #freshmarket #torvehallerne #torvehallernekbh #nørrevold #denmark #denmark_in_love #copenhagen_in_love #scandinavia #scandinaviantravels #scandinavia_in_love #копенгаген #дания #скандинавияEn 3-retters dessertmiddag med @soelleroed_kro & @magasinet_laekkerier er ligeså lækkert som det lyder (og ser ud)... 🤤таких крутых продуктовых рынков я еще не видела 🐟🐟🐟
маркет “Torvehallerne” был в двух минутах от нашего дома, там мы постоянно завтракали /а иногда и ужинали/
и только по приезду оказалось, что этот маркет включают в топ-10 мест, которые надо посмотреть в Копенгагене 🙈🙈🙈
там действительно очень необычно, стильно и вкусно 😋
можно недорого пообедать, набрав салатов и выпечки из разных лавок, а завтракать надо обязательно в кафе “Groed”, где подают огромную тарелку овсяной каши /название кафе так и переводится “овсяная каша” 😅/ с топпингами за сорок/пятьдесят крон
.

Los gourmets acuden a diario  a sus dos edificios modernistas que albergan 60 puestos de frutas, verduras, carne y pescado, pero también puestos de flores y pequeños restaurantes donde comer algo rápido. #electricfood #alkalinevegan #drsebi #drsebiapproved #lymphaticdrainage #drrobertmorse #veganalternative #veganfood #afrovegan #alkalinelifestyle #vegancph #soulfood #torvehallerne #freshfood #økologisk #denmark #godbody #detoxgoals #eattolive #eatingclean #lifecoach #healingwithfoods #cleanse #energy #plantbasedlifestyle #nomeat #plantbasedalternativesJeg ved godt, at vi alle sammen taler om Juno Bakery på Østerbro, og de er også dygtige, bevares. Men mit yndlingsbageri er og bliver Lauras Bakery. Ikke kun fordi personalet er venligt, og siddepladserne i Torvehallerne er perfekte til en kaffe/kage-pause, men også fordi deres brød, kager, kaffe og cookies er det bedste, jeg nogensinde har smagt. Tag nu denne her - en snegl med drømmekage. Så simpelt, så syndigt, så lækkert! Og så har jeg vist også tidligere lovprist deres Red Velvet Cookies, som jeg skal have mindst en gang om måneden. Suk. I gør det godt @lauras.bakery #lovecph .
.
.

Selvom jeg allerede savner det varme vejr, så glæder jeg mig faktisk en lille bitte smule, til at have uldsokker på, tænde stearinlys & filmaftener 👀. Den lækre mad er bestilt igennem Wolt og er fra @fiskerikajen - søde og dygtige mennesker, som serverer lækker mad 😍🤤. #stalksandroots #bride #bridalbouquet #weddingbouquet #weddingflowers #flowerstagram #flowers #bouquet #flower  #flowerphotography #floweroftheday #copenhagen #flower_daily #flowerpower #torvehallerne #staycationSmørrebrød - Danish Open-face sandwiches.  This shrimp smorrebrod consists of buttered rye bread with a mountain of hand peeled shrimps and dill covered in a light cream/mayo sauce.  Comes with a slice of lemon on the side.  It is refreshing, tasty and filling.  This sandwich is light in flavor, not overwhelming, and the focus is on the fresh shrimps and its perfect texture.

Morning shopping in Helsinki’s own wannabe #torvehallerne 💐If you're ever in Copenhagen, y'all need to go to #Torvehallerne and check out a little place called Laura's Bakery - not only a delicious espresso, but naturally one the best Danish Pastries I've ever had the privilege of consuming.

This was classic cinnamon bun, but with brown sugar candied coconut 🙊

(n.) the Danish ritual of enjoying life’s simple pleasures 🥐 ☕️ ⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ @preview.app #Copenhagen

#bienmanger #smørrebrød #torvehallerne #cph #copenhague #copenhagen #danemark #denmarkAn example for all Food markets and Foodhallen; Torvehallen in Copenhagen. So many good international and local food to try you have to visit this more than once! A great place to sit, eat and drink 🍷 or do some shopping 🛒. Get inspired and get your appetite on! #copenhagen #copenhagenfood #torvehallerne #foodie #foodhallen #foodmarket #food #hungry #fridayfood #foodinspiration #ilovefood @torvehallernekbh @lelestreetkitchen @uganic_torvehallerne @briochedoreedk #myfoodmiles#cph #pride #torvehallerne #dk🇩🇰☀️ #nyhavn #torvehallerne #smørrebrød #rosenborgcastle #amalienborgpalace #nycarlsbergglyptotek #kobenhavn #copenhagenSjóormurin – vi er ikke sikre på, at vi kan sige det færøske ord, men vi ved, at det betyder ‘søslange’, og at det er navnet på den seneste opskrift fra Traditionel Strik, der netop prydes af et traditionelt færøsk mønster inspireret af havdyret 🌊🐍 Sweateren findes fra str. 1 til str. 14 år og strikkes i Pura Lana, en rustik men blød blanding af uld og alpaca. —————

#stalksandroots #dahlia #georginer #flowersofinstagram #flowers #flower #interior #interiordesign #copenhagen #flower_daily #flowerpower #torvehallerne🌶THIS FRIDAY AT BRAZARIA 🌶  Brazaria is throwing a wonderful late afternoon outdoor BBQ accompanied by Dj Anders Winkler, who is flipping old original vinyl from South America to the sound from the crackling fire, and the smell from the tender meat on the grill. 🔥

We line up with a lavish BBQ menu, and our our bar is serving chilled cocktails and bubbles 🍹🍸🍾 😋. Salsa Picante - Menu. 🍴Picada Grill:
Homemade Chorizo, Grilled cheese, Chimichurri, Padrons, Amarillo mayo kr. 125.- 🍴Picada Royal :
Beef, Slow cooked Pork, Homemade Chorizo, Chicken, Padrons, Chimichurri, Amarillo mayo kr. 250. 🍴Argentine Giant Shrimps, Chimichurri, Amarillo mayo kr. 150.- 🍴Sweet potatoes fries, Amarillo mayo kr. 50.- ⭐️About Dj Anders Winkler ⭐️
"Grooveyvibesman" is the moniker of Anders Winkler, a record collector who just recently returned from Columbia with a big bag of old traditional sunshine music. 🤗👉This Friday he will be playing an arousing mix of finds from Medillin containing music from Columbia and adjacent countries from 1940 - 1985. The set is made by crate digging the streets of downtown San Antonio and will make a delicate introduction to the music of Latin America by combining Salsa, Bossa, Afro-Cuban and Cumbia. This will definitely contain lots of delicious horns, delirious rhythms and happy vocals. 🌞💃🏼 Come join us for a latesummer afternoon/evening at Brazaria/Torvehallerne. 
With love 
Brazaria Crew ❤️#music #cocktails#goodfood #torvehallerne #visitcopenhagen #visittorvehallerne #untraditional #churrascariaDREAMING

Torvehallerne er et af mine favorit hængudsteder, nok fordi jeg elsker den stemning der er steder med streetfood.

Jeg har et stykke tid nu gerne ville forbi Banana ved Torvehallerne og endelig får jeg smagt deres is😋

Hos dem blander de bananisen (som er lavet på små minibananer)med lidt citron, svesker og Oatly Havremælk for at lave substansen lidt mere cremet lækker. Når den er klar kommer den op i softicemaskinen- ja sådan en kommer jeg nok ik lige til at skaffe mig, men må da lige prøve med andre slags bananer end de helt almindelige. Så man kunne købe røde bananer i Torvehal 1, gad vide hvordan det ville blive😝

Når nu jeg endelig er her måtte jeg også lige et smut forbi CoffeeCollective og Grød- ja og så faldt jeg lige over et YourLocal tilbud hos Grannys House- så jeg har da fået en hel udflugt ud af det idag😁#torvehallerne #copenhagenBjørn, Karl & Nini’s smågrise • Anneksgården

#kobenhavn  #copenhague #torvehallerne #instablogger #exoticfruits #fruits #gastronomy #shotofthedayWhat are the Benefits of Raindrop Technique?
There are numerous benefits of the Raindrop Technique. Here are just a few:

Balance and Re-align the Energy Centers of the Body – The combination of techniques brings electrical and structural alignment to the body. The essential oil blend of Valor helps the body align and is often referred to as “chiropractor in the bottle”. Non-Manipulative Technique– No manipulation as in chiropractic is performed. The oils help support the body to come back into balance by opening energy flow throughout the body.

Reduce Stress and Minor Anxiety – Not only can the oils enhance positive emotions such as joy and happiness, but they can also help us release negative emotions that are subconsciously stored on a cellular level. See the section on stress for more information!

Aid the Body’s Natural Response to Irritation and Injury – Thyme and Oregano support the immune, respiratory, nervous, and other body systems. They are strong antioxidants.

Ease Occasional Muscle, Bone, and Joint Discomfort – Muscles that are sore, spastic or stressed will also benefit. Basil, Wintergreen, Marjoram, Cypress and Peppermint essential oils reduce tension in muscles. Wintergreen supports healthy bone structure. See the section on oils for muscles for more information!

Improve Immune System Functions – Thyme and Oregano essential oils support the immune system; and aid in the release of toxins in the body. This will contribute positively to your overall health and well being.

Paul Caradan
www.caradan.dk
Copenhagen | Bucharest

#repostHar du hørt om Copenhagen Cooking? Hvis du er madelsker har du nok! Uanset hvad skal du glæde dig til 10 fantastiske dage den 24/8-2/9, med det kulinariske i fokus! Jeg har lavet et lille skriv om selve festivalen, samt hvilke events der næsten er et must! Blandt andet “Danmarks bedste smørrebrød” som i ser her, er her også i år. Strawberries, or “jordbær” in Danish, are the absolute best here in Denmark! This little jordbær was picked fresh this morning and was the absolute best tasting strawberry I have ever had! Eating well while traveling is so easy when there are cute markets with fresh fruits and veggies like this! 🍓🍓🍓

Blue poppy seeds have a slightly nutty taste and their natural sweetness makes them a popular addition to breads and cakes. Dry roasting them gives them a stronger flavourful.

Så kig forbi, vi triller hermed bolden videre.

#maradona#diego#tango#empanadas#ribeyesteak#fries#ninspiration#norwegian#travel#assdo#birkegade#nørrebro#futbol#argentina#bocajuniorsMadagascar peber rimmet laks med rå syltede fennikel, Rød peberfrugt og karse #hav2go #torvehallerne #onsdag #sommer #laks #fennikel #rødpeber #karse 🐟😊🐟#fisk2gangeomugen #sisse&co🦐 MÅNEDENS TORVEVARE - SKALDYR 🦀

Om sommeren myldrer det med stimevis af skaldyr på de danske havbunde. Krabber, muslinger, rejer, østers og jomfruhummere er alle vante kendinge i fiskernes net, og på danskernes grill, i sommermånederne. Dyk med ned i skaldyrernes forunderlige verden, når vi tager dig med en tur under havoverfladen i august-måned.Torvehallerne Copenhagen #torvehallerne#fruits#vegetables#healthyfood#copenhagen

#stalksandroots #torvehallerne #copenhagen #flowerstagram #flowers #flowerstothepeople #summerflowers #summerpalette #summer #organic #flowerfieldAnd I thought food in Stockholm was excellent, Copenhagen food scene was superior! #justwow 😲

1. Cold & Snaps - Highly recommended by our dear Danish friend, Jens, this place didn’t disappoint! Understand #smørrebrød and you will fall in love with the city’s open sandwiches！

2. Food market #torvehallerne - more smørrebrød at @hallernes 😋

3. Era Ora - Italian. Service was excellent, very informative and fun staff 😊 @eraoracph

4. Geist - - Had yet another amazing potato dish!!! Absolute favorite dish of the trip so far, covered in finely shredded Parmesan cheese yet the bottom side of the fluff ☁️ is nicely seared and crispy. Brilliant! @bobech

5. Barr - Lump roes with Belgium waffles + sour cream..Lumpfish roes are tasteless. Lesson learned.#mandemodelklubben  #torvehallerneWe have an exciting day ahead of us with all the organic flowers from our field coming in, plus the weekend preparations & bouquets that are to be made. Drop by and visit us today from 10-20! Looking forward to seeing you! 🌸🌿🌻

Yellow mustard is not as strong as black or brown, though the seeds are larger. They are often used whole to make pickles, chutneys and and other savoury preserves.

Only about 200 g final weight. The garment is a combination of the hand dyed Wild WoolSilk and Kid Seta. So easy to knit, 2 rows with Wild WoolSilk and 2 rows with Kid Seta using needles 3½ mm. 
Sus loves quality in all aspects, here tacos from Hija de Sanchez 😋🌮. Do you also like lightweight garments?

Husk sidegangene

#torvehallerne#københavn#inspired#urbanplanning#streetfood#meetingpeople#citybathing#denlillehavefrue#hvorskalvihenFomos no mercado Torvehallerne, lá tem muitas opções de restaurantes, feirinha com frutas, barraca sorvete  sem açúcar e tudo com uma pegada orgânica. Para um café tem o The Coffee Collective, pães e tortas o Lauras Bakery entre outras opções. Mas deu uma vontade de comer MASSA. E vimos esse restaurante, a cara dos pratos estava ótima (vendo as pessoas comendo...rs). Pedi um Linguini de mexilhão, DIVINO! O molho era leve, parecia que tinha umas raspas limão sciliano, um salzinho que devia ser “flor de sal” dando toque especial. Não sei dizer, era diferente, não era um molho branco qualquer. Estava tão bom que fiquei com pena do sanduíche que ele tinha pedido (estava gostoso, mas o linguini robou a cena) e decidi dividir o prato com ele. Todo mundo feliz e satisfeito😍😋😂#linguine #mussels #unmercato #copenhagen #denmark #seafood #travel #torvehallerneBlack currants, memories of childhood #forevermood #torvehallerne #copenhagen

#torvehallerne #omegnogvenner #food #pork #kraut #sandwich @kattinge_kraut #copenhagen @torvehallernekbh @omegnogvennerByd velkommen til vores nye chokoladebrand, Butlers🍫 
Butlers er en irsk familieejet virksomhed, som har eksisteret siden 1932. De laver luksuriøse chokolader både som plader eller i fyldte udgaver. 
I kan allerede nu får fingrene i de lækre chokolader i en af vores butikker eller på vores webshop www.broders.dk.

•
Rose petals are popular in Middle Eastern cooking, but they have a wide variety of uses further abroad. They make a good flavouring for jams, syrups, and desserts, and can be eaten fresh on salads or cooked into liquids.

NU OGSÅ I HELLERUP
Og så det bedste sted!
NAVA HELSEMARKED
12 forskellige juicer på lager, så du altid kan sammensætte en helt frisk JUICEKUR efter din smag. Du kan købe ind til lige så mange dage du ønsker og kan endda købe de forskellige juicer enkeltvis.
Se det flotte vindue og bliv inspireret.
Selvfølgelig er den bedste juicekur økologisk, 100%koldpresset og frossent, så er den altid frisk.
God fornøjelse!
De ved alt om juicekur hos NANA

Massage on back, neck, shoulders remove the side effects of a big mental and physical stress. It is recommended both to cure and prevent. This pleasant form of relaxation is right where the neck muscles, trapezius muscle and back muscles are stiff because of the single-load, prolonged stay in a sitting position, stress or long hours spent in front of a computer. It brings relief from headaches and cervical spine, helps in correct breathing and maintaining proper posture, removes accumulated stress, relaxed and improves the condition of the mind.

#Lathyrusodoratus #ærteblomst #torvehallerne #flowers #pink #flowershop #flowerlovers #flowerstagram #floweroftheday #copenhagen #scent #colours #summer #sommeridanmark #mindfulness #sweetpea #LathyrusAftenen sluttes af med Resso’s kager i Torvehallerne. #lækkerier #torvehallerne #bagværk #kage #cakeVi er stolte af at kunne præsentere dig for vores nye butik @arnoldbuscktorvehallerne ❤️. Butikken er lille, men med et bredt og lækkert sortiment af koge- og livsstilsbøger 🥑🍉🥨🥘📚. Vi åbner i morgen kl. 10 i hal 2, og det gør vi selvfølgelig med manér 🍾🍰🎈. Hvis du er i området, så kom forbi til bobler og chokolade fra @chocolateandlove hele dagen fra kl. 10 til 19. Mellem kl. 15 og 17 kan du også få lov til at smage på @cafeandre3000’s lækre kager, og der vil være gratis ‘Mere mellem linjerne’-stofnet at bære dagens indkøb hjem i til de første 50 kunder. Ses vi? 👋🏼 #meremellemlinjerne #arnoldbuscktorvehallerne #torvehallerne #torvehallernekbh #åbning#torvehallerne

Fenugreek is a pungent addition to food, and popular in Middle Eastern, Mediterranean and Indian cooking. The seeds are yellow-brown and when ground feature prominently in many commercial curry powders. The deep, strong, nutty flavour complements many eastern and western dishes.
•
Get yours from the link in bio 👆Mexican Cuisine 🌮
#mexican #cuisine #copenhagen #copenhagenfood #sanchez #torvehallerne #kærlighed #hergårdetgodt #citylifeYessiiiiir! Det er jo ingen hemmelighed, at jeg ELSKER hindbærisen fra Rokkedyssegård, som man indtil nu har skullet helt til Værløse eller Dronningmølle for at få fingrene i. Men, men, men... nu kan man altså også købe den i Rokkedysses bærbod i Torvehallerne i København 😍🙌😍...jamen altså jeg kan slet ikke få armene ned! Isen er præpakket i bægre i 2 størrelser...min favorit er den med tilsat fløde, men de har også en hindbærsorbet til dem der foretrækker det... ⚡ I am SO excited because I just realised that my favourite #raspberry #icecream is now available at the seasonal @rokkedysse #berry stand @torvehallernekbh in #copenhagen...😍 #ohhappyday #rokkedysse #hindbær #is #bær #sorbet #torvehallerne #torvehallernekbh #københavn #iceicebabySolskin og familie hygge i skønne København 💁🏼‍♀️ Er jeg den eneste der jubler over det her vejr ?🎉☀️ #solskin #livoggladedage #københavn #københavnerlivet #torvehallerne #kbh #sol #hedebølgekoman #vildmeddet #weekend #weekendvibes #happiness #happyface #sommer #solskinsdage #sunshine #copenhagen #sunnydays #saturday

-
Smørrebrød is traditional Danish sandwiches. Quite similar to Spanish tapas, but bigger testier and more filling.
-
According to Mercer's Quality of Living cities ranking report in 2018, Copenhagen is n9 best city in the world to live.
-
Denmark is an n3 country in the world in Ease of Doing Business Rank.
-
Denmark is actively hunting international professionals and investors for Cleantech, Tech, Life Science, Food, Maritime, Design and Innovation.
-
Freetown Christiania is still existing, and its cannabis trade flourishes.
-
Copenhagen could be the best place in the world for the living, but its bloody cold.
-

#denmark #vejle #torvehallerne #sushi #wine #goodbye #dinner #friday #weekend #spicy #food #rawfish #colours #visitvejle #sushitime ##photography #phptographer #instagood #opdagdanmark #loveit #iphoneonlyCoffee Collective Torvehallerne in CopenhagenTacos hos Hija de Sanchez ✨Sanchez bekræfter min holdning om, at jeg simpelthen ikke kan blive vegetar. Vi fik tre forskellige tacos, hvoraf den ene var med braiseret okse. Wow den var god! Enormt smagfuldt kød med en fyldig umami. De resterende to tacos var også ganske delikate med mozzarella og syltede rødløg og en med æg og tomat. 😋De hjemmelavede chips var en helt anden og bedre oplevelse end Santa Maria’s, ligesom at den tilhørende guacamole med stikkelsbær var et hit! Sprød af rå løg, sød og syrlig og spækket med friske koriander. Måltidet var en ren smagseksplosion, der også pirrede den trigeminale nerve med de stærke chilisaucer, som man kunne tilføje ved siden af. (Pas på med dem 😅) Tak for mad! Jeg ser frem til at besøge den rigtige Sanchez på mandag! @sanchezrosio @hijadesanchez @sanchezvesterbro #takfortacos #streetfood #torvehallerne #sydamerikanskmadergenialt #deharforståetatsammensættesmage #BANG #minesanserblevbombarderet #RIPTaco #minkathedTaco #erdetbrutaltatnævneidennesammenhæng?2 stop for the Night, Thanks #hijadesanchez for making my evening a little more Spice #tacos #torvehallerne #dinner #mexico #cheflife #tgifGlad Midsommar! 😄 🍺🎉👍🏽😎

Currently eating (and drinking) my way through Copenhagen’s famed Torvehallerne. People watching is on point! #traineatsleeprepeat #carboloading #restthebrain #torvehallerne #gormspizza #coffeeconnection #macrobowls #allwineisfineSoursop or Graviola på dansk..is immensely rich in vitamin and minerals. Particularly, vitamins like B1, B2, and C pack it with millions of benefits. Researchers have revealed that it contains potassium, calcium, zinc, phosphorus, and magnesium too. It is impossible to find all these factors in one fruit.
Thankyou @uganic_torvehallerne for my weekend treat💚

Easy way to spice up tomorrows holiday cooking - Carribean Chicken Rub - can be used as a dry rub, or blended with oil and lemon juice to make a marinade.
•
The recipe is even suitable for vegetarians - just substitute the meat with tofu - marinate over night and then grill it.

A playfull Petit Four.... #1starmichelinTake a look at the amazing petit four - only at Restaurant Kiin Kiin.Friday view? 😃 #notyet #torvehallerne #niceview #kulørtelamper #bird #phenix #flowers #sunglasses #cava #glasses #sitting #onabarstool #københavn #copenhagen #friday or #saturdaywhen the (once) sous chef from @nomacph decides to make tacos...I had an amazing time at the Copenhagen Kimchi Festival this weekend. I didn’t get much sleep the entire bus ride of 14 hours from Prague to Copenhagen but I had enough energy to make it to the festival 😂😁 Can you tell I ❤️ Korea? It has always been my dream to live and work in Korea perhaps I should try applying for work and travel next summer😍 The kind lady at the book booth was so surprised by our enthusiasm and knowledge of Korean culture that she offered us many books about Korea (we practically took all the books on display😁). Also, I finally got to try a hanbok, tried several yummy Korean food, listened to some of my favourite music and even enjoyed an amazing traditional musical performance by @gookbab5 - Lee Hyunjung (gayageum), Han Soojin (biwa) and Lee Yeoggyeong (dance). These guys are truly gifted!!! Please do follow them if you’re into traditional korean music.
@gookbab5 - 이 현정 (가야금), 한수진 (비와), 이경경 (무용)의 전통 음악 공연. 이 녀석들은 재능이 뛰어나고 전통 한국 음악에 종사하는 사람이라면 따라갈 수 있습니다.

#tacos #hijadesanchez #torvehallerne #celebrating #wednesday #food #mexicanfood #amazing #foodgasm #summer #sun #sol #healthy #lovelife #københavn #fashionblogger #blogger #copenhagen #denmarkVoyage à Copenhague #2: se balader. Nous avons décidé de tout faire à pied (et poussette) et ce n'est pas un problème, car Copenhague n'est pas une très grande ville. Il est aussi évidement possible de louer des vélos mais nous n'avions pas vraiment de budget pour cela (et nous n'étions pas très rassurés non plus, soyons honnêtes).
La balade que j'ai préférée est le jardin botanique. De grandes serres et un parc rempli d'écureuils. Pas loin, il y a les halles Torvehallerne où nous avons mangé un incroyable risotto et un chouette porridge sucré chez @groedcph. Si vous aimez les lieux un peu insolites, je vous recommande le cimetière Assistens qui est magnifique et envahit par le végétation. Le parc du Kastellet est sympa aussi et si vous marcher quelques minutes de plus vous pourrez voir la fameuse petite sirene (qui m'a fait le même effet que le manneken pis, à savoir: ha c'est ça !).
#etsijevoyageais #etsijevisitaiscopenhague #copenhague #kastellet #groed #assistens #torvehallerneAnd this incredible coffee soft ice, made with their Espresso 1 blend and topped with some coffee. 
Coffee tastic!

A needed coffee stop at @coffeecollectif in @torvehallernekbh. I had the Kieni and @jomtones had the Tegu and Mike had an Americano. ☕️🇩🇰 #fika #foodie #thecoffeecollective #espresso1 #foodpics #torvehallerne #københavn  #softice #foodblogger #foodstagram #instafood #kaffee #kbh #cph #kaffe #oatly #mjukglass #vegan #foodtour #malmö #coffeecollective #glass #flødeis #icecream #is #coffee #denmark  #coffeeshopA needed coffee stop at @coffeecollectif in @torvehallernekbh. FOODIE HEAVEN!Good morning! At Ma Poule, we sell cheese, wine, charcuterie, patés, but we also sell dairy products. Here, you have an example of what you could do, if you bought a Fromage Frais 40%. A fresh and filling breakfast to start off your day just right. Its rich taste and thick texture will make it hard to forget breakfast! We have a large selection of products you might like, so come and check it out!如果想喺哥本哈根搵食，就一定要嚟Torvehallerne Market 😋

#smorgasbord #copenhagen #torvehallerneBurro bananas have very little fat and are very low in calories. They are high in potassium and also contain a significant amount of vitamin B, vitamin C, fiber and magnesium. They also contain amounts of phosphorous, magnesium, calcium, iron, zinc, copper and selenium.

Fresh Oyster with kimchi granitè and red currants 🍴 by chef @julianjeon & @snaildang 👨🏻‍🍳👩🏻‍🍳

#copenhagenkimchifestival #코펜하겐 #덴마크 #김치페스티벌 #코펜하겐김치페스티벌 #kimchifestival #torvehallerneНа рынках Амстердама и Копенгагена продают идеальные по форме и цвету овощи и фрукты. В Европейском союзе большинство людей считает, что качество употребляемых продуктов напрямую зависит от их внешнего вида. По этой причине супермаркеты устанавливают особые стандарты качества для фруктов и овощей, и при приеме их у фермеров отбраковывают большую часть. Тусклый цвет, некрасивая форма, не подходящий размер-все это может стать причиной для того, чтобы продукты ушли в утиль. И их просто выбрасывают. По данным шведских и голландских правительственных экспертов, ежегодно в Европе на свалку отправляется порядка 89 млн тонн продуктов питания. Статистика ужасающая. А ведь неправильной формы морковка или огурец, или помидор наоборот являются признаком натуральности овоща. Так что не бойтесь выбирать неидельные овощи или фрукты 🍅 🥒 🥕So this is how it's like to be the happiest people on earth. #denmark #copenhagen #americandream #mikkellerandfriends #torvehallerneFandt lige et billede fra @arlaunika tiden...

#denmark🇩🇰 #copenhagen #holiday #reffen #souls #cafebopa #nyhavn #torvehallerne #vintage #HAY #husetsteaterMy boyfriend and I were to the copenhagen kimchi festival today😊😀There was music and song we stood and watched. Suddenly we were chosen to dance a Korean traditional wedding dance😱😳😂 We were quickly stuffed in some traditional clothing🎎 We got instructions to follow the two ladies' steps in the front. It went so fast so I don't have any video of us dance, but is the same dance and clothing the couple after us dance in the video. It was fun and a bit transboundary, but we did it and got a little gift for dancing with them🎁 🕺💃 #torvehallerne #cph #copenhagen #kimchifestival #kimchi #korea #traditional #dance #boyfriend #timewhitboyfriend #gift #koreanfood #sun #summerincph #funIt wouldn’t be Copenhagen without an endless variety of Smørrebrød (open faced sandwiches) at the Torvehallerne food market at Israel Square in Copenhagen! .

#space #love #iphoneonly #style #perspective #beautiful #colourful #boy #nordic #light #like #fabulous #instagay #instagood #instastyle #pretty #travel #travelblog #traveller #explorer #delicious #smile #lifestyleblogger #fashionblogger #architecture #archilovers #coffeecollection #delditkbh #wienerbrød #torvehallerneSiempre que viajo me encanta conocer los mercados y comprar alguna especie típica para despues cocinar. En Copenhagen visité Torvehallerne. Como verán en las fotos, hay una variedad y calidad de productos fantásticos. Hay lugarcitos donde comer, vinoteca, casas de té, de plantas, aromáticas,utensilios de cocina ademas de productos frescos. Esta muy cerca de la estación de Norrebro. Si les gustar comer y tomar rico, no dejen de visitarlo!! En la foto de portada se dan una idea de la cantidad de bicis que hay en Copenhagen y andan a mil, así que como peatones hay que cuidarae mucho de ellos!!🚳⚠️#miterceracto #lifestyleblogger #lifestyleblog #ilovetotravel #denmark #copenhagen #torvehallerne #travelandfood #viajarycomerbienEDIBLE FLOWERS 😜

#stalksandroots #torvehallerne #copenhagen #flowerstothepeople #flowers #plants #houseplantclub #urbanjungle #interior #magasin #magasindunord #deliveryForever loving fruit and vegetable displays. 😍🥕🍅🍑🥦😋. #sandra_wallis_copenhagen #torvehallerne #visitcopenhagenLooking for a healthy snack? Peas are the way to go! 
I know it might sound weird. I thought it was odd when I found out people eat them raw in Denmark 😆
But how weird can it be? It is only a veggie 🌱

They are super tasty, they need zero preparation time, they have their own little packaging and they are a great source of fiber and protein 😃

Give them a try. If they are organic even better 👌🏼

내 얼굴크기 지못미...ㅋ😱

.PORTOBELLO MUSHROOMS 🍄❤️ One cup of cooked portobello mushrooms provides 5.2 g of protein and 10 IU of Vitamin D 
I love their taste and their versatility!

Since I need to keep my Vitamin D levels up I eat them pretty often. I like to make portobello risotto or to stuff them with the day before left overs 😅

Soon I will be sharing my recipes with you 👩🏻‍🍳Combo of The Day! 🇲🇽

.
.
I would’ve stayed at this food market forever if I could’ve and I’m bummed that we only discovered it on our last day in Copenhagen. So many stalls! So many choices! How was a broke American blipster supposed to choose?!
Alas, I dragged my sad foodie butt back on the bus and looked forlornly back at the greatest destination in Copenhagen and tried doing the math on how soon I could possibly come back to raid all the stalls. 
The answer is probably no time soon but a girl can dream, amirite? I would just need a dashing Dane on a bike to make it all good (this is the third post where I’ve mentioned how good-looking Danish men are, good god). 🚴🏼‍♂️💁🏽‍♀️
.
.
.

Rented our bikes at the airport (Candy and Randy...yes, I of course had Candy💁🏽‍♂️), rode an hour to our place, played with the cats, ate at a brunch buffet, and hit #Nyhavn followed by #Freetown. SPICE SPECIALIST 📃
•
Herb salt is simply one of the most versatile mix on the spice rack and could be used in variety of dishes. Among many other things, it can be used as a finishing to pizza and pasta, and to season grilled or roasted meats and fish. Try it in a salad dressing, too 🌱
•

Sidste år faldt den i pinsen og forrige år på en søndag. Men Grundlovsdag er jo også en lukkedag i sig selv, så i både København og Lyngby har Uldstedets butikker lukket. Vi glæder os til at hjælpe jer igen i morgen – indtil da ønskes I god Grundlovsdag! ————————————————-

Not all is lost ☀️ I think in my last post I made it seem like this trip was horrible but it wasn’t. I did enjoy it, I have an experience to share and people to remember. While here I walked to a market for 30 minutes everyday  because it was the closest food market (kinda understand why people bike everywhere)🙃 this food market had everything from traditional danish food to Mexican tacos. You buy food here and then go eat it at the park nearby. One thing I enjoyed here it’s how relaxed and chilled people are. Like extremely chilled...men walking around shirtless and all, midday. Must be that free health and education system. Also the weather was so much nicer than NY, I got tanned just by walking around. During the summer, the sun sets around 12am and that’s where the fun starts....somewhat. But now I’m paying off all those sleepless nights with this jet lag 😭When it’s market time in Copenhagen .
.
